QuestData.Title: Troll Patrol: Whatdya Want, a Medal?
QuestData.Description: Look at me, $r. Do I look like I have time fer fillin' out reports?$b$bIt be all I can do to keep this post free o' the bloody Scourge, and they want me to mess with paperwork!$b$b<sigh> No sense in complainin'. I need to get the commander some kinda kill count from the last skirmish.$b$bYou wanna be helpful? Go and get me all the medals you can find from the dead trolls around here. That'll hafta be close enough.
QuestData.LogDescription: Captain Grondel outside the Coliseum wants you to gather 7 Drakkari Medallions from the nearby Drakkari Corpses.
QuestData.CompletionText: You get those medals for me, $r?
QuestData.RewardText: Well, now!$B$BYa saved me a fair bit o' work there $Glad:lass;. I'm grateful. I'll be sure ta make mention of ya in me report.$B$BOff with yeh now. Finklestein'll likely be waitin fer ya a bit west o' here.
